motions.title: Move Items #11 and #12 to Business Items
motions.description: Motion to move item #11 (Contract Extension with Triscapes) and item #12 (Dunwoody Cultural Arts Center HVAC Replacement) from consent agenda to business items.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval as Amended
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including June meeting minutes, amicus brief resolution, election resolution, and Planning Commission appointments.

motions.title: Contract Extension with Triscapes for Road and Stormwater Maintenance
motions.description: Approval of contract extension with Triscapes for road and stormwater maintenance services.

motions.title: Dunwoody Cultural Arts Center HVAC Replacement
motions.description: Award contract to Addison Smith Mechanical Contractors for HVAC replacement at Cultural Arts Center in amount of $233,101 using General Capital Project Fund.

motions.title: Shared Police SWAT Equipment Vehicle MOU
motions.description: Resolution to authorize execution of MOU for shared SWAT equipment vehicle with cities of Brookhaven, Chamblee, and Doraville.

motions.title: Approval of Purchase for Axon Equipment
motions.description: Purchase of four additional Axon fleet cameras, ten body worn cameras, and ten extra Taser 7s.
